---
title: "Tidy Data"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
pulse_data  <-
  haven::read_sas("./data_import_examples/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
  pivot_longer(
    pulse_data,
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
) %>% 
  mutate(
    visit = recode(visit, "bl" = "00m")
  )
```
